TopicTitle: Save file editor for OS X?

Articles.Content:
Are there any save file editors for OS X (or multi platform) with outline views and all the things good IDEs spoil developers with?

Currently I'm using TextMate with code folding (F1) to manually hide vessels I don't need at the moment.

What's the file format for the save files (for syntax highlighting)? Something proprietary?

I wish it was JSON; would make things a lot easier.
